name: Lex Laser Saves The Galaxy, Again
blurb: A tactical puzzle RPG designed for busy people.

rewards.reward: BACKER - Thank you!!  You'll get access to all of our updates, and also access to a secret backer-only online store for physical goods.  (We'll take suggestions for new products.) All later tiers share this benefit, too.
EARLY BIRD PLAYER - Thank you!! We'll give you a digital copy of the finished game for Mac, PC, or Linux, DRM free.
PLAYER - Thank you!!  Just like in the EARLY BIRD PLAYER reward, we'll give you a digital copy of the finished game for Mac, PC, or Linux, DRM free.
IMPATIENT PLAYER - Thank you!!  We'll send you your digital copy of the finished game at least a week before it goes on sale.
BETA TESTER - Help us get the bugs out!  We'll give you early access to the game well before it is fully done.  Comments and bug reports welcome.  ==== You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER benefit. ====

ALPHA TESTER- Please help us stamp out bad game design before it can take root and destroy us all!  Alpha access to Puzzle Mode as early as we can get it to you.  Admire our placeholder art!  ==== You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER and BETA TESTER benefits. ====

SONIC RISK TAKER - A DRM free download of the game soundtrack.  Also, you can choose to be listed as a Patron in the game credits.  ==== You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, and ALPHA TESTER rewards. ====

ARCHEOLOGIST - Thank you!!  See how it was made.  We'll send you a digital download of the Development History Pack: a collection of art and snapshots of the game from throughout the development process, with developer comments.  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, and SONIC RISK TAKER rewards. ====

CAMEO - Thank you!! We'll include a (tasteful) name of your choosing in our random database of extras.  You could appear as a refugee, a wage-slave, a soldier, a colonist, a corpse....  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, SONIC RISK TAKER, and ARCHEOLOGIST rewards. ====

FAMILY CAMEO - Thank you!!!  Like with CAMEO, the names of your entire (nuclear) family will appear in our database of extras.  We'll try to have you appear together in the game.  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, SONIC RISK TAKER, and ARCHEOLOGIST rewards. ====

GRAD STUDENT - Thank you!!!  You invented a fantastic piece of technology used in the game.  Your advisor gets top billing in the hyphenated title, but you still get your name on it.  Imagine the Smith-YourName Warp Drive!   We'll try to get you a technology that you think is particularly cool, and to pair your name with a cool-sounding partner.  (If there are conflicts, we'll draw straws.)  Later tiers do NOT share this benefit.  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, SONIC RISK TAKER, ARCHEOLOGIST, \r\nand FAMILY CAMEO (or just CAMEO) rewards. ====

SYNTHESIZER - Thank you!!!  You're off the chart.  As the discoverer of one of the elements 119-125, you get to name it.  These unexpectedly stable elements are useful and extremely valuable.  Later tiers do NOT share this benefit.  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, SONIC RISK TAKER, ARCHEOLOGIST, FAMILY CAMEO (or just CAMEO) rewards. ====

PROFESSOR - Thank you!!!  You invented a fantastic technology used in the game.  (One of your grad students helped a little.)  It's not the Smith-YourName Warp Drive, it's the YourName-Smith Warp Drive!  Later tiers do NOT share this benefit.  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, SONIC RISK TAKER, ARCHEOLOGIST, FAMILY CAMEO (or just CAMEO) rewards. ====

SCRAP BOOK HERO - Thank you!!!  We'll send you a high quality print of your favorite game art, as a "thank you" signed by the entire development team.  (We'll have to send it all around the USA to get it signed, first.)  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, SONIC RISK TAKER, ARCHEOLOGIST, and FAMILY CAMEO (or just CAMEO) rewards. ====

MAD SCIENTIST - They all said you were mad, mad at the University!  No one would listen.  But you still made it work, and now one of the truly great discoveries of all time has your name on it.  No one else can claim credit, because they all said it couldn't be done.  This is like GRAD STUDENT and PROFESSOR, but it's just your name and you get first choice on which technology you invent.  Later tiers do NOT share this benefit.  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, SONIC RISK TAKER, ARCHEOLOGIST, FAMILY CAMEO (or just CAMEO), and SCRAP BOOK HERO rewards. ====

WORLD BUILDER - Thank you!!!  You will work with the team to define a setting for at least one of our Episodes.  An alien jungle?  A zero-G theme park?  A ballroom dance hall?   (This setting will be available for all players, so we will reserve editorial control.)  Later tiers do NOT share this benefit.  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, SONIC RISK TAKER, ARCHEOLOGIST, FAMILY CAMEO (or just CAMEO), and SCRAP BOOK HERO rewards. ====

IMAGE CONSULTANT - Thank you!!!  You will help define a variation on the Lex Laser character visuals for our artists to create.  Age, gender, race, hair, body type, facial features....  What does your hero look like?  (This version of Lex Laser will be available for all players to select, so we will reserve editorial control.)  This is a visual representation only; all Lex Laser variations will have the same gameplay and story lines.  ====  You also get the IMPATIENT PLAYER, BETA TESTER, ALPHA TESTER, SONIC RISK TAKER, ARCHEOLOGIST, FAMILY CAMEO (or just CAMEO), and SCRAP BOOK HERO rewards. ====
